definition: unfit for anything/no good/useless/(of a sick person) beyond hope
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: This ware is suitable for decorative purpose but unsuitable for utility.
The old lady said she was lamed by age.
sentences.chinese: 老婦人說她年紀大了，不中用了。

sentences.english: When it comes to getting things done, he is useless.
sentences.chinese: 一涉及到做事，他便不中用了。

sentences.english: I may be senescent , I am not yet senile.
sentences.chinese: 我可能有顯點老了，但還沒有老到不中用的地步。

sentences.english: Actually pilfer edition smooth dish is pleasant to the eye just about really lumpish thing.
sentences.chinese: 其實盜版光碟真正是中看不中用的東西。

sentences.english: Butter me no parsnips and tell me exactly what happened.
sentences.chinese: 是不中用的，告訴我究竟發生了什麼事情？

definition: (coll.) old man/(said of an aging husband) my old man
weary old body (colloquial term, used jocularly or irreverently)
blurred vision of an old person (idiom)
unable to accomplish anything but liable to spoil everything (idiom)/unable to do anything right/never make, but always mar
pinyin: cheng2 shi4 bu4 zu2 , bai4 shi4 you3 yu2

definition: (derog.) old but still alive/old fart/old bastard
wine sack, food bag (idiom); useless person, only fit for guzzling and boozing
geezer with one foot in the grave (used jokingly or as an imprecation)
